question:
Consider the following
If a network has impedance (1 - j) at a specific frequency, the circuit would consists of series

  1. R and C
  2. R and L
  3. R, L and C

explanation: RC circuit has impedance of the form (1 - j). Moreover R, L, C circuit can also have impedance of the form 1 - j if XC > XL.
